entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Teslin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Teslin Airport 09:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %

Dewpoint: -19.1°C
